Interface LogRouter.RootRouter

All Superinterfaces:
AutoCloseable, LogLifecycle, LogRouter
Enclosing interface:
LogRouter
public static sealed interface LogRouter.RootRouter extends LogRouter
Root router is a router that has child routers.

    • levelResolver

      Level resolver to find levels for a log name.

    • onChange

      void onChange(Consumer<? super LogRouter.RootRouter> router)
      Register for a router changes usually involving the level resolver being updated by config.
      Parameters:
      router - consumer that will be called with the updated router.
      API Note
      its best to use the router in the consumer accept argument and not this router even if they are usually the same.
